General.Name: Daodaoquan Grain and Oil Co Ltd
General.Description: Daodaoquan Grain and Oil Co.,Ltd. operates as an oil processing company in China. The company, together its subsidiaries, is involved in the scientific research, production, trading, warehousing, and logistics of edible vegetable oils and related by-products. It offers packaged edible vegetable oils, including rapeseed oil, soybean oil, corn oil, coriander oil, sunflower oil, and their blended oils under Daodaoquan, Caiziwang, Jincaiwang, and other edible oil brands. The company is headquartered in Yueyang, China.
